ul_246903: # Start a process (nc) that listens on port 8080
$ nc -l 8080 & bg
[1] 17454
[1] nc -l 8080

# Get the process listening on port 8080:
$ fstat | grep :8080
cmihai   nc         17454    3* internet stream tcp 0x0 *:8080

$ portpid() { fstat | grep ":$1" | awk '{print $3}' ;}
$ portpid 8080
17454

au_1056644: lsof -n -i:8080 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}'

alias test1="echo $(lsof -n -i:8080 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}')"

for p in `sudo lsof -n -i:8080 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}'`; do sudo kill -9 $p; done
